KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Directory sizeof 005
KnowledgeBase.HumanKeywords: sizeof closure bytes length disk memory

Example.Description:
These examples return the closure size of the Directory objects.
The closure size would depend on the
length of the evaluated objects.

Syntax.Note: Returns the number of bytes required to save to disk.
Syntax.Hints: The closure size may be different values for the same object on different hardware platforms due to word alignment issues. The values returned from the sizeof function in the examples above are the values returned on a Intel Pentium-based platform.
